238d4bfa-466c-4af4-a94e-7dbaf01e73bb.description: An Automated Cloud Governance (ACG) Team Member provides active guidance for solving problems associated with ACG. They collaborate with industry experts to create the Cloud Security Notification Framework (CSNF), which defines common definitions & syntax across multiple cloud providers of cloud security events/alerts & alarms ingested by many tools. An ACG Team Member has knowledge about zero-trust security, security data lake, SIEM, SOAR, DevSecOps, and security architecture.
238d4bfa-466c-4af4-a94e-7dbaf01e73bb.name: ONUG 2021 Automated Cloud Governance Working Group Team Member

b4fdeebf-7a0a-49e2-b06d-e9949f64f4e9.description: The Cloud Native Security Working Group team member is involved in activities that range from developing security architectures and reference solutions to performing proof-of-concept work on subjects of high industry interest – such as container security. 20e003aa-b048-457b-bb0d-b942483cd324.description: A Policy as Code Team Member provides active guidance for helping large enterprise cloud consumers manage risk and automation in their Enterprise Cloud deployments with Policy as Code best practices. Members are Enterprise Cloud Consumers, IT suppliers, and Cloud Service Providers that will work together to meet the demands of risk mitigation by collaborating and developing a Policy as Code Reference Architecture for today’s Enterprise IT players.
20e003aa-b048-457b-bb0d-b942483cd324.name: ONUG 2023 Policy as Code Working Group Team Member

f5ce83b0-32bf-4ff4-83e6-3614a55dab8d.description: The Policy as Code Chairperson provides thought leadership and guidance for helping enterprise cloud consumers meet the demands of risk mitigation via automated governance in the face of increasing challenges and complexity brought on by multi-cloud infrastructure in today’s enterprise technology platforms. The chairperson will collaborate with industry experts to fulfill the initial Working Group’s Goal of developing a Policy of Code vocabulary and reference architecture.

dca99fc0-9249-4696-ab5e-9e0e47346bf1.description: Leads a team of senior technologists from both consumer and producer organizations to provide security thought leadership to the ONUG community.
